H0.text: How many legs (including arms or pincers according to certain definitions) does a crab have. 6

H1.text: How many legs (including arms or pincers according to certain definitions) does a crab have. 8

H2.text: How many legs (including arms or pincers according to certain definitions) does a crab have. 4

H3.text: How many legs (including arms or pincers according to certain definitions) does a crab have. 10

A5.text: Decapods have ten legs (pereiopods), found on the last five thoracic segments.
